Name: Grave Rejects
Description:
RPG Server With Leveling 
 
 - 1 Year Paid 
 - Experience System 
 (gear score removed) 
 - Weapon Mastery 
 (with offline decay) 
 - NPC Bounties 
 (factions will hunt you) 
 - Increased Physical Damage 
 - Max Inventory Stacks 
 - Lower Durability Loss 
 - Lower Repair Costs 
 - 2x Crafting/Refinement Rates 
 - PVP Punishment System 
 (debuff when killing low levels) 
 - PvP Kills Announced 
 - PvP Ladder Board 
 - Weekend Castle Raids
